comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.120 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

1. run Y!
2. run www.estadao.com.br  (this is a brazilian newspaper site)
3. Each new MF version desarm some plug-ins with more enfasis in internet banking securities SW


Actual results:

1. some Y! options did´nt run, or be frozen (I sent emails to Yahoo - they must be checked because they have a a pointer to MFv.5)
2. in this case the main page is out of regular presentation
Attention: both sites are running OK in IE8 and CHROME
I run Windows XP SP3 (and Mozilla v.8.0)
3. I can´nt run some internet banking before to instal (when available) the securities SW


Expected results:

I believe that there are some incompatibilities between MF 8.0 and the Y! and estadao.
I really trust that you and the main sites around the world must speake together with more speed before to launch new versions.
Mozilla becames my main navigator immediatly after my son presented it to me.
Raul.

comments.text: Please do not use the security sensitive flag when it is not needed. It only restricts the number of people who can see your bug report. Please also let the developers choose the priority and severity until you get a better understanding how to use them.
comments.author: bob@bclary.com
comments.creator: bob@bclary.com
comments.raw_text: Please do not use the security sensitive flag when it is not needed. It only restricts the number of people who can see your bug report. Please also let the developers choose the priority and severity until you get a better understanding how to use them.

(In reply to j.j. from comment #2)
> What is MF 8.0?

---------- Mensagem encaminhada ----------
From: Raul Galvani Filho <raulgf97@gmail.com>
To: bugzilla-daemon@mozilla.org
Date: Wed, 16 Nov 2011 08:58:12 -0200
Subject: Re: [Bug 702588] problems with new Yahoo mail and with www.estadao.com.br
M (mozilla) F(firefox) 8.0
First of all excuse if my english is bad. In portuguese (Brasil) should be better.
I had a phone conversation with a person of www.estadao.com.br (brazilian newspaper site, phone # 55-11-38563904) about this problem and he answer that he checked his site and the problem source is exactly this Mozilla Firefox new version (8.0), and Yahoo thinks the same.
These two site runs without problems in CHROME and Internet Explorer  both in Windows XP SP3.
This version, and older, gives problems in bank security plug-ins, problems that do not happens with the others navigators. Think that is very difficult to a cliente to access an internet banking which is blocked due  the security plug-in can´nt runs under Mozilla new version - so the client must have to wait till the bank modify its SW and send emails to the clients to install the updated version.
I request, pls, that you review this version 8.0 and be sure that your futures versions will not cause these kind of problems.
Remember: I´m a Mozilla user and defender.
Thanks and best regards.
Raul 

2011/11/15 <bugzilla-daemon@mozilla.org>
Do not reply to this email. You can add comments to this bug at
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=702588#c2

raulgf97@gmail.com
comments.author: raulgf97@gmail.com
comments.text:
I sent a complete list of what happened but, let´´s go to reproduce:
1.Yahoo mail is messy, that means, I can´nt use emails(read or write), see spam, etc... (check with Yahoo)
2. I can´nt see the notices in www.estadao.com.br-the notices are in  different places than the original must be (why not to check with them in 55-11-38562904)
3. Why each new version affect some brazilian banks securities plug-ins? (check with Banco do Brasil e Banco Itau)
I repeated what I wrote in my last emails and now I gave suggestion of contacts.
Has Mozilla any brazilian dealer or office or somebody that can be contacted for info? If you have portuguese of Brasil you must have somebody that can check what happened.
You see, the moving from last version 7 to 8 was very fast; the 7 was running OK and the 8 has problems; this is a trace, an evidence to be checked.
Other tip: check in the Google reviews of users.
Pls spend a time to search the trouble. we are only sending emails one to the other but our steps don´t go ahead.
Raul.
